body:
These are game suggestions btw I just didn't know where to put them so yea.
CTF - We should have Capture the flag or wool or whatever block or something in Nebula because to be honest always playing capture the monument gets really quite boring after a while, it's just the same thing.
1v1 -  This should be in a different category but nvm that ;)
I think there should be a section where you can 1v1 people at Vanilla/ Rare, pot and soup pvp.

title: CTF & 1v1

replies.body: We dont have ctw coz avicus is unique and funky doesnt want minigames that are on loads of servers on here thats why there isn't many gamemodes like ours

Avicus wasn't made to be unique, Whale.
But I agree, maps like Rendevous were made to be CTW and DTM doesn''t suite.
